title: Emotional Test Drive
description: A simple, repeatable test drive flow that builds confidence through emotional check-ins, real-life scenarios, and value-based language.
objective: Guide a test drive that turns features into feelings—so the guest can picture ownership and confidently say, ‘this fits my life.’
learning_outcomes: Run a consistent Emotional Test Drive flow (start → scenes → check-ins → wrap).
Use future pacing + sensory language to make benefits feel real.
Use micro-confirmations to keep the guest engaged and safe.
Create a clear ‘decision-ready’ moment before returning to numbers.
